title: Egan Bernal Keeping Fingers Crossed for Tour de France Selection: ‘With the Tour I Would Be Happy’
content:
Former Tour champ continues upward trajectory with fourth overall at Tour de Suisse, wants to be part of the Ineos squad this summer.

Read the full article at Egan Bernal Keeping Fingers Crossed for Tour de France Selection: ‘With the Tour I Would Be Happy’ on Velo.
